name: part_003
file: tmp_【３D】ライブも企画も！誕生日祭だーー！！！！【 #大神ミオ誕生日 】 [ChMwx4yeI3g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the song performance of 'Hyakka Ryouran Hanafubuki'.
MC section where Mio, Ayame, and Fubuki talk about their performance and say goodbye.
Mio talks to herself about her lucky spot being the sea, followed by a transition.
Mio arrives at a virtual sea setting and is surprised to find Ayame there as well.

subtitles.original: …少女たちは純情
subtitles.english: ...the girls are purehearted.

subtitles.original: そのらりくらり ここからゆらめき歌うわ切磋
subtitles.english: Wandering aimlessly, I'll flicker and sing from here, polishing my heart.

subtitles.original: 浅き夢見しと思ひ 踏み込むこの世界は
subtitles.english: Thinking I've seen a shallow dream, I step into this world.

subtitles.original: 誰も皆 焦がれる
subtitles.english: Everyone yearns for it,

subtitles.original: 現世の理よ
subtitles.english: the logic of this ephemeral world.

subtitles.original: 色付く想いは切な 百花繚乱花吹雪
subtitles.english: My coloring feelings are painful—a riot of flowers, a blizzard of petals.

subtitles.original: 秘密数えて
subtitles.english: Counting my secrets...

subtitles.original: ここにおいで
subtitles.english: ...please come here.

subtitles.original: 暁 交わした約束は
subtitles.english: The promise we made at dawn,

subtitles.original: 本物だと きっと信じてる
subtitles.english: I surely believe it's real.

subtitles.original: いろはにほへと 華に魅せられた少女たち
subtitles.english: Even as the flowers fade, the girls are enchanted by their beauty.

subtitles.original: あはらり はらり はらり 落ちる花と舞い踊れ
subtitles.english: Ah, gently, gently, gently, dance with the falling blossoms.

subtitles.original: 泡沫（うたかた） 袖（そで）でも想い 言の葉に込めてみた
subtitles.english: Even if my sleeve is ephemeral, I've put my feelings into words.

subtitles.original: 誰も皆 焦がれる
subtitles.english: Everyone yearns for it,

subtitles.original: 現世の理よ
subtitles.english: the logic of this ephemeral world.

subtitles.original: 色付く想いは切な 百花繚乱花吹雪
subtitles.english: My coloring feelings are painful—a riot of flowers, a blizzard of petals.

subtitles.original: 風に舞う 乙女の純情 咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: Purehearted maiden dancing in the wind, bloom in full glory!

subtitles.original: （歓声） 楽しかったー！
subtitles.english: (Cheering) That was so much fun!

subtitles.original: 終わっちゃったー！踊りきったー！
subtitles.english: It's over! We danced our hearts out!

subtitles.original: 2人とも、どうもありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Thank you both so much!

subtitles.original: いや、こちらこそ！
subtitles.english: No, thank you!

subtitles.original: ケーキまでご馳走になっちゃって、誘ってくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: You even treated us to cake. Thank you for inviting us!

subtitles.original: お腹もいっぱいや。
subtitles.english: I'm stuffed too.

subtitles.original: お腹いっぱいになりました。
subtitles.english: My stomach is full.

subtitles.original: そ、そうか。それなら良かったんだが。
subtitles.english: I-I see. I'm glad to hear that then.

subtitles.original: ご馳走様でした！
subtitles.english: Thanks for the treat!

subtitles.original: でも、うちは百花繚乱花吹雪をこうやって3人で踊るのめっちゃ好きなの。
subtitles.english: But you know, I really love dancing 'Hyakka Ryouran Hanafubuki' as a trio like this.

subtitles.original: わかる、楽しい！いいよね！
subtitles.english: I know, it's so fun! It's great, right?

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ。もう一生懸命覚えたしさ、今でも覚えてるしさ。
subtitles.english: Exactly. We practiced so hard to learn it, and I still remember it perfectly.

subtitles.original: 振り付けが合う時とかすごい気持ちいいんだよな。
subtitles.english: It feels so good when the choreography syncs up perfectly.

subtitles.original: 今日は誕生日に2人に来てもらって、本当に嬉しかった。ありがとうね！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy you both could come for my birthday today. Thank you!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: まぁちょっとケーキは食いきられてしまったけれど…。
subtitles.english: Well, the cake did get all eaten up though...

subtitles.original: また買おう！また今度！
subtitles.english: Let's buy more! Next time!

subtitles.original: また別でお祝いするから。
subtitles.english: We'll celebrate again separately later.

subtitles.original: やった！それならよし！
subtitles.english: Yay! Then that's fine!

subtitles.original: ケーキパーティーしよ！
subtitles.english: Let's have a cake party!

subtitles.original: ということで、そろそろお時間らしいぞ。
subtitles.english: Anyway, it seems it's about time.

subtitles.original: 我々はじゃあ、帰るか！
subtitles.english: Shall we head back then?

subtitles.original: えー！帰っちゃうのー！？
subtitles.english: Eh?! You're leaving already!?

subtitles.original: 裏で見てるから大丈夫。
subtitles.english: We'll be watching from backstage, so don't worry.

subtitles.original: 舞台袖から応援し合おう。
subtitles.english: Let's cheer each other on from the wings.

subtitles.original: 賑やかしてくれても全然いいから！
subtitles.english: You're welcome to liven things up anytime!

subtitles.original: あ、そうだミオ、今日のミオのラッキースポットをさっき聞いてたんだった。
subtitles.english: Oh, right! Mio, I heard about your lucky spot for today earlier.

subtitles.original: ラッキースポット？
subtitles.english: Lucky spot?

subtitles.original: ラッキースポット、海らしいよ。
subtitles.english: Apparently, your lucky spot is the sea.
The sea!?

subtitles.original: 海！？夏だしね。
subtitles.english: The sea!? Well, it is summer.

subtitles.original: 海がすごい穴場らしいです。
subtitles.english: Apparently the sea is quite the hidden gem.

subtitles.original: 海で打ち上げ花火とか見てみたいなぁ。
subtitles.english: I'd love to see fireworks display at the sea.

subtitles.original: いいねー！そんなことできるのかなぁ？
subtitles.english: That sounds great! I wonder if we can do that?

subtitles.original: 夏だし見たいよね。
subtitles.english: It's summer, so I definitely want to see them.

subtitles.original: ということで、我々はちょっとお先に…。
subtitles.english: Well then, we'll be heading off now...

subtitles.original: おいとまいたすぜ。ありがとうね！
subtitles.english: ...we'll take our leave. Thank you!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: え、ラッキースポット海だって…。
subtitles.english: Eh? My lucky spot is the sea...

subtitles.original: でも他のメンバーもいるかもしれないから、ちょっと海に行ってみようかなぁ。
subtitles.english: But since the other members might be there too, maybe I'll go check out the sea for a bit.

subtitles.original: おおー、すごい星空！
subtitles.english: Ooh, what an amazing starry sky!

subtitles.original: ちょっとお祝いなので、海行きたいなーと思って、夏だし。海に来ちゃいましたー。
subtitles.english: Since it's a celebration, I felt like going to the sea, and since it's summer... I've arrived at the sea!

subtitles.original: あれ？あ、あれ？お、ミオちゃん。
subtitles.english: Wait? Oh, wait? Oh, Mio-chan.

subtitles.original: え！？あやめ！？どうした！？え、忘れ物？
subtitles.english: Eh?! Ayame?! What's up?! Did you forget something?

subtitles.original: ここ、スタジオじゃないよ！
subtitles.english: This isn't the studio, you know!

subtitles.original: あれ？なんか、あれ？なんでここ海なん？
subtitles.english: Wait? Somehow, wait... why is it the sea here?

subtitles.original: 夏だから、うちが来たいなーと思って。
subtitles.english: Since it's summer, I felt like coming here.

subtitles.original: あ、夏。そういうことね。
subtitles.english: Ah, summer. I see.

subtitles.original: ワープしてきちゃったんだよ。
subtitles.english: I just warped over here.

subtitles.original: なんか、ミオちゃんとまだ歌いたかったなーと思いながら歩いてたら、なんか海に着いちゃったね。
subtitles.english: I was walking while thinking about how I wanted to sing with Mio-chan some more, and somehow I ended up at the sea.

subtitles.original: うちのことを思いながら歩いてたら、いつの間にか来ちゃった？海に。
subtitles.english: You were walking while thinking about me, and before you knew it, you arrived? At the sea?

subtitles.original: 海に着いてました。
subtitles.english: I arrived at the sea.

subtitles.original: それって、てぇてぇってこと！？
subtitles.english: Does that mean... we're 'Tee-tee'!?

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!
